text: well the site where the explosion took
place is just a few meters 100 meters or
so in that direction and what you can
see behind me here are the remains of a
dormitory for migrant workers you can
see how the blast has torn through here
ripping the walls off buckling the
structure if we move over this way you
can see how this which was once a
two-story structure has been collapsed
down on itself now people say there were
a number of serious injuries here pretty
horrific scenes as people scrambled from
their beds tried to get to safety but
we've also seen a number of people
seemingly unscathed picking through the
rubble
when I heard to the first blast I got
out of bed straight away then came the
second explosion and I had to crouch
down and then I ran away well this is
pretty much the front line of where the
emergency workers have come to you can
see some of the fire crews taking a
break and if we walk this way you get a
really good sense of just how powerful
an explosion this was you can see this
container on the back of this lorry here
and you can see how the force of the
blast has pushed the side of it inwards
and we're just now probably 50 meters or
so from the perimeter of the warehouse
where the explosion took place and if we
walk down this way and stand on the end
here you can see the giant stacks of
containers on the site and you can see
how the explosion has tumbled them down
broken and buckling them as it's done so
and you can see that thick black acrid
smoke still billowing from the sytems
from a long way off actually you can
taste that smell of burning heavy
hanging heavy in the air the fire burned
so intensely here that in places the
metal ran molten and the cars are still
hot to touch and this scene of burnt and
blackened cars stretches in every
direction row after row as far as the
eye can see
well this apartment block complex here
was the closest to the site of the
explosion
now people much further afield in
tianjin reports some damage to their
houses windows broken that kind of thing
but of course here because of the
proximity the devastation is so much
greater and every single one of the
windows in this whole apartment block
complex stretching back a long way in
that direction have been blown out by
the force of the blast closer up of
course you can see the poignant
upsetting scenes of lives dislocated
destroyed perhaps by the force of an
explosion that came without warning
around 11 o'clock at night when
everybody here thought they would be
safe in their beds
